ygData.subject: Re: Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash
ygData.msgSnippet: lol... i like the singing exp thingy... Nicademous ... From: Kah Wai  To:  Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
lol... i like the singing exp thingy...

Nicademous
----- Original Message -----
From: Kah Wai <kwchow@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 10:10 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash


> From: "Kah Wai" <kwchow@...>
>
> Hi, thks for the repy.
>
> around 9pm is optimum for us to play coz US is 6am or 9am depending on
which
> part. So places that r usually camped are more or less open for hunting
> then.
>
> I was at the sister camp and it was empty, formed a group of 3-4,
consisting
> of lvl9-12. Good exp good loot, hehe managed to almost lvl so I'll be at
it
> again tonight.
>
>
> Bardman Melodeuss of
> 9yrs singing experience
>
